TextLibrary.Text: Gruulkar
Ahaha! The little Human is back! What do you want?
Ahaha! The little Human is back! What do you want?
Ahaha! The little Human is back! What do you want?
Ahaha! The little Human is back! What do you want?
I wish to speak with you about the troops you are gathering.
I wish to speak with you about the troops you are gathering.
I wish to speak with you about the troops you are gathering.
I wish to speak with you about the troops you are gathering.
Perhaps you want to join us? But I don't think we have room for little Humans, eh?
Perhaps you want to join us? But I don't think we have room for little Humans, eh?
Perhaps you want to join us? But I don't think we have room for little Humans, eh?
Perhaps you want to join us? But I don't think we have room for little Humans, eh?
I don't want to join you, Gruulkar, I want to stop you. Is there really a need for war?
I don't want to join you, Gruulkar, I want to stop you. Is there really a need for war?
I don't want to join you, Gruulkar, I want to stop you. Is there really a need for war?
I don't want to join you, Gruulkar, I want to stop you. Is there really a need for war?
Ahaha! You are funny! I might ask: is there really a need for PEACE? We are Orcs. We are born to fight. War is in our blood.
Ahaha! You are funny! I might ask: is there really a need for PEACE? We are Orcs. We are born to fight. War is in our blood.
Ahaha! You are funny! I might ask: is there really a need for PEACE? We are Orcs. We are born to fight. War is in our blood.
Ahaha! You are funny! I might ask: is there really a need for PEACE? We are Orcs. We are born to fight. War is in our blood.
I'm going to stop you, Gruulkar.
I'm going to stop you, Gruulkar.
I'm going to stop you, Gruulkar.
I'm going to stop you, Gruulkar.
I have decided that because you amuse me, I will spare your life. Now leave! I do not want to see your ugly Human face here again.
I have decided that because you amuse me, I will spare your life. Now leave! I do not want to see your ugly Human face here again.
I have decided that because you amuse me, I will spare your life. Now leave! I do not want to see your ugly Human face here again.
